speaker.whotheyare: Samir works to make business and technology climate solutions mainstream.
speaker.whylisten: Samir Ibrahim is the CEO of SunCulture, a climate technology platform for emerging markets that focuses on bringing affordable and renewable solar energy to smallholder farmers in Africa. He won the inaugural Pitch and Flow competition, a rap battle hosted by MC Lyte where emcees are paired with entrepreneurs to share ideas, solutions and social change messages using the global appeal of hip-hop.
